item.title: Nontechnical Meetings
item.description: Here’s a meeting structure I have found to be very useful for weekly update meetings. It’s a little long for a daily meeting, unless you have a small team. Time Activity 10 minutes On a sheet of paper, thoughtfully right out your completed action items from the previous week, and your action items foe the coming week. Identify any potential problems at the end (three sections, 3 minutes per section) 0 minutes Pass the paper to the person to your left 1 minute Review and mentally prepare to pitch and represent your coworkerâ€™s week 3 minutes Explain their week to the group.
